CTR.Q: What type of chart is this?
CTR.A: This chart is a {stacked area chart}.

VEC.Q: How many series are represented in this stacked area chart?

VPR.Q: Which series contributes the largest portion to the total mortgage rate?
VPR.A: The series with the largest contribution is {Horizon Funding}.

VPR.Q: Which series contributes the smallest portion to the total mortgage rate?
VPR.A: The series with the smallest contribution is {Aura Finance}.

VE.Q: What is Aura Finance's Mortgage Rate in 1985?
VE.A: Aura Finance's mortgage rate in 1985 is {3.55} %.

VE.Q: What is Aura Finance's Mortgage Rate in 1984?
VE.A: Aura Finance's mortgage rate in 1984 is {3.87} %.

VE.Q: What is Horizon Funding's Mortgage Rate in 1990?
VE.A: Horizon Funding's mortgage rate in 1990 is {5.98} %.

VE.Q: What are the mortgage rate of Apex Credit, Aura Finance, and Sapphire Loans in 1995?
VE.A: Apex Credit's mortgage rate is {4.50} %, Aura Finance's mortgage rate is {1.11} %, Sapphire Loans's mortgage rate is {5.22} %.

EVJ.Q: What is the global minimum total Mortgage Rate in the stacked area chart?
EVJ.A: The global minimum total mortgage rate is {15.73} %.

EVJ.Q: What is the global maximum total Mortgage Rate in the stacked area chart?
EVJ.A: The global maximum total mortgage rate is {20.20} %.

SC.Q: What is the average height of Horizon Funding's Mortgage Rate area?
SC.A: The average height of Horizon Funding's mortgage rate area is {6.86} %.

SC.Q: What is the average height of Aura Finance's Mortgage Rate area?
SC.A: The average height of Aura Finance's mortgage rate area is {1.88} %.

SC.Q: What is the average height of Apex Credit's Mortgage Rate area?
SC.A: The average height of Apex Credit's mortgage rate area is {4.07} %.

SC.Q: What is the average height of Sapphire Loans's Mortgage Rate area?
SC.A: The average height of Sapphire Loans's mortgage rate area is {5.08} %.

NF.Q: Which years did the total Mortgage Rate go below 17 %? Please list the years and corresponding total values.
NF.A: total value was {17.04} % in {1985}, total value was {15.73} % in {1986}, total value was {16.78} % in {1992}.

NF.Q: Which years did the total Mortgage Rate exceed 18 %? Please list the years and corresponding total values.
NF.A: total value was {20.20} % in {1999}, total value was {19.33} % in {1998}, total value was {19.54} % in {1994}.

NF.Q: Which years did the total Mortgage Rate fall between 17 and 19 %? Please list the years and corresponding total values.
NF.A: total value was {17.38} % in {1984}, total value was {17.18} % in {1991}, total value was {18.18} % in {1989}.

NC.Q: Between 1985 and 1998, did the total Mortgage Rate experience a larger or smaller change than between 1991 and 2001?
NC.A: The change in total mortgage rate between {1985} and {1998} was {larger} than between {1991} and {2001}.

NC.Q: Between 1989 and 1991, was the average total Mortgage Rate higher or lower than between 1993 and 1997?
NC.A: The average total mortgage rate between {1989} and {1991} was {lower} than between {1993} and {1997}.

NC.Q: Between 1986 and 1997, did the total Mortgage Rate experience a larger or smaller change than between 1983 and 1985?
NC.A: The change in total mortgage rate between {1986} and {1997} was {larger} than between {1983} and {1985}.

NC.Q: Was the total Mortgage Rate in 1998 higher or lower than in 2000?
NC.A: The total mortgage rate in {1998} was {lower} than in {2000}.
